description: Detects execution of the "jamf" binary to create user accounts and run commands. For example, the binary can be abused by attackers on the system in order to bypass security controls or remove application control polices.
author: Jay Pandit
false_positives: Legitimate use of the JAMF CLI tool by IT support and administrators
name: JAMF MDM Execution
query: (process.executable:/.*\/[Jj][Aa][Mm][Ff]/ AND process.command_line.text:(*createAccount* OR *manage* OR *removeFramework* OR *removeMdmProfile* OR *resetPassword* OR *setComputerName*))
